title: Introduction
description: Welcome to the official I7A UI documentation.
body:
const{Fragment:n,jsx:e,jsxs:i}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(t){const o={a:"a",h2:"h2",li:"li",p:"p",span:"span",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...t.components};return i(n,{children:[e(o.p,{children:e(o.strong,{children:"This is not an npm library. This is how you own your component layer."})}),"
",e(o.p,{children:"Traditional component libraries ask you to install dependencies and import pre-built components. This works until you need something different. Then you're stuck writing wrappers, overriding styles, or piecing together incompatible solutions."}),"
",e(o.p,{children:"I7A UI takes a different approach. Instead of abstracting components behind packages, it gives you the actual code. You install, customize, and own every component in your project."}),"
",e(o.p,{children:"The kit is built on these core principles:"}),"
",i(o.ul,{children:["
",i(o.li,{children:[e(o.strong,{children:"Direct Ownership"}),": Component code lives in your project. No black boxes."]}),"
",i(o.li,{children:[e(o.strong,{children:"Unified Design"}),": Every component follows the same patterns and works together seamlessly."]}),"
",i(o.li,{children:[e(o.strong,{children:"Simple Distribution"}),": A CLI and schema system makes adding components effortless."]}),"
",i(o.li,{children:[e(o.strong,{children:"Production-Ready"}),": Carefully crafted defaults mean you ship faster without sacrificing quality."]}),"
",i(o.li,{children:[e(o.strong,{children:"AI-Native"}),": Open code that AI models can read, modify, and enhance."]}),"
"]}),"
",i(o.h2,{id:"direct-ownership",children:[e(o.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#direct-ownership",children:e(o.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Direct Ownership"]}),"
",e(o.p,{children:"When you add a component from I7A UI, the source code becomes part of your project. This means:"}),"
",i(o.ul,{children:["
",i(o.li,{children:[e(o.strong,{children:"Complete Visibility"}),": See exactly how each component works under the hood."]}),"
",i(o.li,{children:[e(o.strong,{children:"Freedom to Modify"}),": Change anything to match your requirements. No workarounds needed."]}),"
",i(o.li,{children:[e(o.strong,{children:"AI Collaboration"}),": Your AI tools can read and improve your components directly."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(o.p,{children:"Traditional libraries force you to work around their abstractions. With I7A UI, you simply edit the code you need to change."}),"
",i(o.h2,{id:"unified-design",children:[e(o.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#unified-design",children:e(o.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Unified Design"]}),"
",e(o.p,{children:"Every component in I7A UI shares consistent patterns and APIs. Whether it's a button, dialog, or data table, you'll find familiar interfaces and predictable behavior."}),"
",e(o.p,{children:"This consistency extends to third-party integrations. When we bring in external functionality, we adapt it to match the I7A design language and composition patterns."}),"
",e(o.p,{children:"Your team learns one way of building. AI models learn one pattern to follow. Everything works together."}),"
",i(o.h2,{id:"simple-distribution",children:[e(o.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#simple-distribution",children:e(o.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Simple Distribution"]}),"
",e(o.p,{children:"I7A UI includes a distribution system built for modern development:"}),"
",i(o.ul,{children:["
",i(o.li,{children:[e(o.strong,{children:"Component Schema"}),": A clear structure defining each component, its dependencies, and configuration."]}),"
",i(o.li,{children:[e(o.strong,{children:"CLI Tool"}),": Install components with a single command. Works across different frameworks."]}),"
",i(o.li,{children:[e(o.strong,{children:"Extensible"}),": Create your own component collections using the same schema."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(o.p,{children:"The system is designed for both manual use and AI-driven workflows. Generate new components that automatically integrate with your existing setup."}),"
",i(o.h2,{id:"production-ready",children:[e(o.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#production-ready",children:e(o.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Production-Ready"]}),"
",e(o.p,{children:"I7A UI components ship with thoughtful defaults:"}),"
",i(o.ul,{children:["
",i(o.li,{children:[e(o.strong,{children:"Clean Aesthetics"}),": Modern, minimal design that looks professional immediately."]}),"
",i(o.li,{children:[e(o.strong,{children:"Consistent System"}),": Components are designed as a cohesive family, not isolated pieces."]}),"
",i(o.li,{children:[e(o.strong,{children:"Easy Customization"}),": Override defaults through standard CSS and component props."]}),"
"]}),"
",e(o.p,{children:"You get high-quality UI without starting from scratch, but with full freedom to adapt to your brand."}),"
",i(o.h2,{id:"ai-native",children:[e(o.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#ai-native",children:e(o.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"AI-Native"]}),"
",e(o.p,{children:"I7A UI is built for the age of AI-assisted development:"}),"
",i(o.ul,{children:["
",e(o.li,{children:"Open source code that AI models can analyze and understand"}),"
",e(o.li,{children:"Consistent patterns that make code generation reliable"}),"
",e(o.li,{children:"Documentation structured for both humans and AI"}),"
"]}),"
",e(o.p,{children:"Your AI tools can suggest improvements, generate variants, or create entirely new components that fit naturally into your design system."})]})}return{default:function(n={}){const{wrapper:i}=n.components||{};return i?e(i,{...n,children:e(_createMdxContent,{...n})}):_createMdxContent(n)}};

title: Introducción
description: Bienvenido a la documentación oficial de I7A UI.
body:
const{Fragment:e,jsx:n,jsxs:a}=arguments[0];function _createMdxContent(i){const o={a:"a",h2:"h2",li:"li",p:"p",span:"span",strong:"strong",ul:"ul",...i.components};return a(e,{children:[n(o.p,{children:n(o.strong,{children:"Esto no es una biblioteca npm. Así es como eres dueño de tu capa de componentes."})}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Las bibliotecas tradicionales te piden instalar dependencias e importar componentes prefabricados. Funciona hasta que necesitas algo diferente. Entonces terminas escribiendo wrappers, sobrescribiendo estilos o juntando soluciones incompatibles."}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"I7A UI adopta un enfoque diferente. En lugar de abstraer componentes detrás de paquetes, te entrega el código real. Instalas,
personalizas y eres dueño de cada componente en tu proyecto."}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"El kit está construido sobre estos principios fundamentales:"}),"
",a(o.ul,{children:["
",a(o.li,{children:[n(o.strong,{children:"Propiedad Directa"}),": El código de los componentes vive en tu proyecto. Sin cajas negras."]}),"
",a(o.li,{children:[n(o.strong,{children:"Diseño Unificado"}),": Cada componente sigue los mismos patrones y funciona en conjunto sin problemas."]}),"
",a(o.li,{children:[n(o.strong,{children:"Distribución Simple"}),": Un CLI y sistema de esquemas facilita agregar componentes."]}),"
",a(o.li,{children:[n(o.strong,{children:"Listo para Producción"}),": Valores predeterminados cuidadosamente diseñados para que entregues más rápido sin sacrificar calidad."]}),"
",a(o.li,{children:[n(o.strong,{children:"Nativo para IA"}),": Código abierto que los modelos de IA pueden leer, modificar y mejorar."]}),"
"]}),"
",a(o.h2,{id:"propiedad-directa",children:[n(o.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#propiedad-directa",children:n(o.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Propiedad Directa"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Cuando agregas un componente de I7A UI, el código fuente se convierte en parte de tu proyecto. Esto significa:"}),"
",a(o.ul,{children:["
",a(o.li,{children:[n(o.strong,{children:"Visibilidad Completa"}),": Ve exactamente cómo funciona cada componente internamente."]}),"
",a(o.li,{children:[n(o.strong,{children:"Libertad para Modificar"}),": Cambia lo que necesites para cumplir tus requisitos. No se necesitan soluciones alternativas."]}),"
",a(o.li,{children:[n(o.strong,{children:"Colaboración con IA"}),": Tus herramientas de IA pueden leer y mejorar tus componentes directamente."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Las bibliotecas tradicionales te obligan a trabajar alrededor de sus abstracciones. Con I7A UI, simplemente editas el código que necesitas cambiar."}),"
",a(o.h2,{id:"diseño-unificado",children:[n(o.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#diseño-unificado",children:n(o.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Diseño Unificado"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Cada componente en I7A UI comparte patrones y APIs consistentes. Ya sea un botón, diálogo o tabla de datos, encontrarás interfaces familiares y comportamiento predecible."}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Esta consistencia se extiende a integraciones de terceros. Cuando incorporamos funcionalidad externa, la adaptamos para que coincida con el lenguaje de diseño y los patrones de composición de I7A."}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Tu equipo aprende una forma de construir. Los modelos de IA aprenden un patrón a seguir. Todo funciona en conjunto."}),"
",a(o.h2,{id:"distribución-simple",children:[n(o.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#distribución-simple",children:n(o.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Distribución Simple"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"I7A UI incluye un sistema de distribución diseñado para el desarrollo moderno:"}),"
",a(o.ul,{children:["
",a(o.li,{children:[n(o.strong,{children:"Esquema de Componentes"}),": Una estructura clara que define cada componente, sus dependencias y configuración."]}),"
",a(o.li,{children:[n(o.strong,{children:"Herramienta CLI"}),": Instala componentes con un solo comando. Funciona en diferentes frameworks."]}),"
",a(o.li,{children:[n(o.strong,{children:"Extensible"}),": Crea tus propias colecciones de componentes usando el mismo esquema."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"El sistema está diseñado tanto para uso manual como para flujos de trabajo impulsados por IA. Genera nuevos componentes que se integran automáticamente con tu configuración existente."}),"
",a(o.h2,{id:"listo-para-producción",children:[n(o.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#listo-para-producción",children:n(o.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Listo para Producción"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Los componentes de I7A UI vienen con valores predeterminados bien pensados:"}),"
",a(o.ul,{children:["
",a(o.li,{children:[n(o.strong,{children:"Estética Limpia"}),": Diseño moderno y minimalista que se ve profesional de inmediato."]}),"
",a(o.li,{children:[n(o.strong,{children:"Sistema Consistente"}),": Los componentes están diseñados como una familia cohesiva, no como piezas aisladas."]}),"
",a(o.li,{children:[n(o.strong,{children:"Fácil Personalización"}),": Sobrescribe los valores predeterminados mediante CSS estándar y props de componentes."]}),"
"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Obtienes una UI de alta calidad sin empezar desde cero, pero con total libertad para adaptarla a tu marca."}),"
",a(o.h2,{id:"nativo-para-ia",children:[n(o.a,{className:"subheading-anchor","aria-label":"Link to section",href:"#nativo-para-ia",children:n(o.span,{className:"icon icon-link"})}),"Nativo para IA"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"I7A UI está construido para la era del desarrollo asistido por IA:"}),"
",a(o.ul,{children:["
",n(o.li,{children:"Código fuente abierto que los modelos de IA pueden analizar y comprender"}),"
",n(o.li,{children:"Patrones consistentes que hacen que la generación de código sea confiable"}),"
",n(o.li,{children:"Documentación estructurada tanto para humanos como para IA"}),"
"]}),"
",n(o.p,{children:"Tus herramientas de IA pueden sugerir mejoras, generar variantes o crear componentes completamente nuevos que encajan naturalmente en tu sistema de diseño."})]})}return{default:function(e={}){const{wrapper:a}=e.components||{};return a?n(a,{...e,children:n(_createMdxContent,{...e})}):_createMdxContent(e)}};
